name: Patrick Facheris
body:
## Major Projects

#### [GitForkedUp](http://www.gitforkedup.com)
![Screen Shot](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3358393/Screen%20Shot%202015-06-29%20at%202.35.59%20PM.png)

DevFest 2015 quick hack with @cjubb39. It was used during the final hackathon as a social, git-based drinking experiment powered by your commit history.

***
#### [Fish Plays Pok√©mon](http://www.twitch.tv/fishplayspokemon)
![Screen Shot](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3358393/nopwzYQ.png)

A fun hack with @catmoresco to wrap up our 2014 HackNY fellowship. Written in python using OpenCV and running on cloud virtualized Ubuntu. It got a ton of press coverage on the homepages of: [BBC News](http://www.bbc.com/news/technology-28704028), [Mashable](http://mashable.com/2014/08/07/fish-plays-pokemon-twitch/), [BuzzFeed](http://www.buzzfeed.com/daves4/fish-plays-pokemon), [Forbes](http://www.forbes.com/sites/davidthier/2014/08/08/20000-people-are-watching-a-fish-play-pokemon/), Business Insider, Techcrunch and hundreds more!

***
#### ReelTime
![Screen Shot](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3358393/ReelTime.png)

HackNY 2013 24Hr hack that "technically" supports infinite users for WebRTC based video chat and allows for synchronized, download-less watching of video file from one user's computer. Functions using websockets and adding of file chunks on the fly to html5 video player.

***
#### [What2DoCU](http://what2docu.com)
![Screen Shot](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/3358393/Screen%20Shot%202013-03-04%20at%2010.28.06%20PM.png)

Finds and ranks events on college campuses based on number of facebook friends from your school attending. Makes use of Node.js and Socket.io for real-time user interaction. Created in one night during HackColumbia 2013 and winner of "Best-Use of Student Affairs API."

***

#### [Ctrl-F](http://ctrl-find.com)
![Screen Shot](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/3358393/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-25%20at%209.52.53%20PM.png)

Universal package tracker built entirely with Javascript (Node.js and Backbone.js)

***

#### [packmule](https://npmjs.org/package/packmule)
![Screen Shot](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3358393/Screen%20Shot%202013-11-16%20at%2012.02.32%20PM.png)

Open-source node module that functions as a wrapper for various shipping APIs, returning standardized Javascript objects. Currently has a total of over 450 downloads since release, averaging about 50 per month.

***

#### [BukkitDuel](https://github.com/PFacheris/BukkitDuel)
![Screen Shot](http://dev.bukkit.org/thumbman/images/45/50/600x337/BukkitDuel.jpg.-m1.png)

Minecraft server plugin for dueling and wagering.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
